Toby Driscoll is a Unidel Chaired Professor in the 
[Department of Mathematical Sciences](https://mathsci.udel.edu) at the [University of Delaware](https://www.udel.edu).

**Get my CV as a [page](cv.qmd) or [PDF](_media/cv.pdf)**


## UD Affiliations 
- [Department of Mathematical Sciences](https://mathsci.udel.edu)
- Department of Biomedical Engineering
- [Data Science Institute](https://dsi.udel.edu)

- Email: [driscoll@udel.edu](mailto:driscoll@udel.edu)

## Online books/course notes
- [Fundamentals of Numerical Computation](https://fncbook.com), with R. J. Braun (print edition via SIAM)
- [Data Science I (Math 219)](https://ud-math-data-science-1.github.io/book/)
